Title: Okey Board Game
Description:
Istaka is a turkish board game called "Okey".
Played with domino like pieces on a board,
with four players getting turns.

Project supports client platform to meet 
players and play the game over internet.

Silverlight, MVC pattern used.

Needs improvement on UI Design.

What is it?

Istaka is a turkish board game called "Okey".
Played with domino like pieces on a board,
with four players getting turns.

Project supports client platform to meet
players and play the game over internet.

Silverlight, MVC pattern used.

Needs improvement on UI Design.
